attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition that the PM and the Government do NOT press for reductions of interest rates, nor press the banks to pass on interest rate cuts because it is unfair to savers. Where are you going to get the money to spend without savers who are being robbed? Today on BBC TV there is an example of this man alone who is saving £500 a MONTH on his mortgage at a time when savers are getting nothing

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
